titles.title: A bill to amend title 32, United States Code, to increase the maximum Federal share of the costs of State programs under the National Guard Challenge Program, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend title 32, United States Code, to increase the maximum Federal share of the costs of State programs under the National Guard Challenge Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Amends Federal provisions concerning State participation in the National Guard Challenge Program (a civilian youth opportunities program conducted by the Secretary of Defense) to: (1) provide a maximum Federal matching funds level of 65 percent of the costs of operating the State program during FY 2004, 70 percent during FY 2005, and 75 percent during FY 2006; and (2) authorize appropriations for the Program for FY 2004 and beyond.
